item.title: Machine Learning Models for Predicting Churn of Customers of a Network of Fitness Centers
item.description: Goals and objectives: analyze the data of the fitness center in order to develop a forecast of customer churn and recommend a strategy for their retention. Input data: fitness center clients' questionnaires, combined into a dataset according to a number of characteristics, including the client’s gender and age, the area of residence or work in relation to the location of fitness center, the client’s participation in the affiliate program, the use of a promo code, etc.
